ch.nolix.core.fileSystem

Class FileAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.fileSystem.FileSystemItemAccessor
      • ch.nolix.core.fileSystem.FileAccessor

  • public final class FileAccessor
extends FileSystemItemAccessor
    A file accessor can access a given file.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileAccessor(java.lang.String filePath)
      Creates a new file accessor for a file with the given file path.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileAccessor

        public FileAccessor(java.lang.String filePath)
        Creates a new file accessor for a file with the given file path.
        Parameters:
        filePath -
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if there exists no file with the given file path in the file system on the local machine.

    • Method Detail

      • clearFile

        public void clearFile()
        Clears the file of this file accessor. Deletes the content of the file of this file accessor, but not the file itself.

      • readFileToBytes

        public byte[] readFileToBytes()
        Reads the content of the file of this file accessor to bytes.

        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs.
